content:

### Events
- Bioanalytical lab shipment: 44 frozen urine aliquots dispatched
- Drug supply reconciliation completed at 23 sites

### Notes
- Week 26: Renal biomarker collection on schedule. 85 subjects enrolled across 4 cohorts. eGFR and urinary biomarkers within expected variability.
